'''Radiant Spincrystal 53''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Hanachirusato (Soundtrack)|Hanachirusato]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on the roof of a building in the [[Kamisato Estate]].
